languages.text: "Станция Футфол задумана великим Парсимусом Девейном как дворец меж звезд, столь же величественный, сколь дух и разум его создателя. В год установки сего когитатора лишь малая часть замыслов великого Парсимуса воплощена в жизнь, но уже сейчас они поражают дерзостью и грандиозностью. Футфолу надлежит стать преддверием дикого и малоисследованного {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g}, опорой для будущих завоеваний {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империума{/g} и благородного Парсимуса Девейна, действующего по воле {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Импера...{/g}"

"Footfall Station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installation, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, a foothold for future conquests by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will..."
languages.original_text: "Станция Футфол задумана великим Парсимусом Девейном как дворец меж звезд, столь же величественный, сколь дух и разум его создателя. В год установки сего когитатора лишь малая часть замыслов великого Парсимуса воплощена в жизнь, но уже сейчас они поражают дерзостью и грандиозностью. traits.locale_text: "The Footfall station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installment, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored Koronus Expanse, a foothold for the future conquests by the Imperium and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the Emperor's will..."

languages.text: 「フットフォール・ステーションは偉大なるパルシムス・ドウェインによって、創設者の精神と心のように荘厳な星々の宮廷として構想されたものである。この考算機が設置された年の時点では、偉大なるパルシムスの設計のほんの一部しか実現されていなかったが、その片鱗でさえも驚異的な大胆さと壮大さを誇る。フットフォールは荒んでおりほぼ開拓が進んでいない{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}への入り口となり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご意志で行動する高貴なパルシムス・ドウェインによる未来の征服の足がかりとなり…」
languages.original_text: "Footfall Station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installation, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, a foothold for future conquests by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will..."

traits.locale_text: 「フットフォール・ステーションは偉大なるパルシムス・ドウェインによって、創設者の精神と心のように荘厳な星々の宮廷として構想されたものである。この考算機が設置された年の時点では、偉大なるパルシムスの設計のほんの一部しか実現されていなかったが、その片鱗でさえも驚異的な大胆さと壮大さを誇る。フットフォールは荒んでおりほぼ開拓が進んでいない{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}への入り口となり、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}のご意志で行動する高貴なパルシムス・ドウェインによる未来の征服の足がかりとなり…」

languages.text: “伟大的帕西姆斯·德维恩构想将落脚港建成一座星际宫殿，如他的灵魂与思想一样宏伟、庄严。尽管这个沉思者安装完毕的那天，帕西姆斯·德维恩的伟大设想只有一小部分化为了现实，但他大胆的宏伟设计已经足以令人叹为观止。落脚港将会成为帝国的门户，通向蛮荒未知、人烟罕至的{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}。在{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的旨意下，它将会成为高尚的帕西姆斯·德维恩未来征途的出发点，将更加广阔的星域纳入{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的版图……”
languages.original_text: "Footfall Station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installation, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, a foothold for future conquests by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will..."

traits.locale_text: “伟大的帕西姆斯·德维恩构想将落脚港建成一座星际宫殿，如他的灵魂与思想一样宏伟、庄严。尽管这个思考器安装完毕的那天，帕西姆斯·德维恩的伟大设想只有一小部分化为了现实，但他大胆的宏伟设计已经足以令人叹为观止。落脚港将会成为帝国的门户，通向蛮荒未知、人烟罕至的{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}。在{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的旨意下，它将会成为高尚的帕西姆斯·德维恩未来征途的出发点，将更加广阔的星域纳入{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的版图……”

languages.text: «La estación de Paso ha sido ideada por el gran Parsimus Dewain como un palacio entre las estrellas, majestuoso como el espíritu y la mente de su creador. En el año de la instalación de este cogitador, solo una pequeña parte del plan del gran Parsimus ha sido ejecutada, y sin embargo su audacia y grandeza ya son anonadantes. Paso será la puerta a la salvaje y apenas explorada {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, un punto de partida para futuras conquistas por parte del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y del noble Parsimus Dewain, que actúa por voluntad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}...».
languages.original_text: "Footfall Station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installation, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, a foothold for future conquests by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will..."

traits.locale_text: «La estación de Paso ha sido ideada por el gran Parsimus Dewain como un palacio entre las estrellas, majestuoso como el espíritu y la mente de su creador. En el año de la instalación de este cogitador, solo una pequeña parte del plan del gran Parsimus ha sido ejecutada, y sin embargo su audacia y grandeza ya son anonadantes. Paso será la puerta a la salvaje y apenas explorada {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, un punto de partida para futuras conquistas por parte del {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} y del noble Parsimus Dewain, que actúa por voluntad del {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g}...».

languages.text: « Le brillant Parsimus Dewain a conçu la station de Castel dans le but d'en faire un palais dans les étoiles, aussi majestueux que l'esprit de son créateur. À l'époque de l'installation de ce cogitateur, seule une infime fraction du plan ambitieux de Parsimus a vu le jour, mais déjà, on peut parfaitement se rendre compte de l'audace et de la splendeur de son dessein. Castel deviendra bientôt un avant-poste incontournable dans les territoires sauvages et inexplorés des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, une base pour les futures conquêtes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et du noble Parsimus Dewain, qui agit selon la volonté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}... »
languages.original_text: "Footfall Station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installation, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, a foothold for future conquests by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will..."

traits.locale_text: « Le brillant Parsimus Dewain a conçu la station de Castel dans le but d'en faire un palais dans les étoiles, aussi majestueux que l'esprit de son créateur. À l'époque de l'installation de ce cogitateur, seule une infime fraction du plan ambitieux de Parsimus a vu le jour, mais déjà, on peut parfaitement se rendre compte de l'audace et de la splendeur de son dessein. Castel deviendra bientôt un avant-poste incontournable dans les territoires sauvages et inexplorés des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, une base pour les futures conquêtes de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} et du noble Parsimus Dewain, qui agit selon la volonté de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g}... »

languages.text: "Die Footfall-Station war die Vision des großen Parsimus Dewain als Palast in den Sternen, ebenso majestätisch wie der Geist und Verstand ihres Schöpfers. Als dieser Cogitator seinen Dienst antritt, ist nur ein kleiner Teil der Pläne des großen Parsimus bereits Realität geworden, aber schon jetzt sind ihr Wagemut und ihre Großartigkeit atemberaubend. Footfall wird das Tor zu der ungezähmten und kaum erkundeten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} werden, eine Basis für künftige Eroberungen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} und des erhabenen Parsimus Dewain, der den Willen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} umsetzt ..."
languages.original_text: "Footfall Station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installation, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, a foothold for future conquests by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will..."

traits.locale_text: "Die Footfall-Station war die Vision des großen Parsimus Dewain als Palast in den Sternen, ebenso majestätisch wie der Geist und Verstand ihres Schöpfers. Als dieser Cogitator seinen Dienst antritt, ist nur ein kleiner Teil der Pläne des großen Parsimus bereits Realität geworden, aber schon jetzt sind ihr Wagemut und ihre Großartigkeit atemberaubend. Footfall wird das Tor zu der ungezähmten und kaum erkundeten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} werden, eine Basis für künftige Eroberungen des {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperiums{/g} und des erhabenen Parsimus Dewain, der den Willen des {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperators{/g} umsetzt ..."

languages.text: "Binliman İstasyonu; ulu Parsimus Dewain tarafından yıldızların kucağında, yaratıcısının ruhu ve zihni kadar görkemli olacak bir saray olarak tasavvur edilmiştir. Bu kavramsayarın kurulduğu yıl itibarıyla ulu Parsimus'un tasarımının yalnızca küçük bir kısmı gerçeğe dönüştürülmüş olsa da cüretkârlığı ve haşmeti şimdiden göz kamaştıran cinstendir. Binliman; yabani ve bilinmezliğini koruyan {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ne{/g} bir kapı, hem {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'un{/g} iradesince hareket eden asil Parsimus Dewain'in hem de {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'un{/g} ufuktaki fetihleri için kale görevi görecektir."
languages.original_text: "Footfall Station has been envisioned by the great Parsimus Dewain as a palace in the stars, as majestic as the spirit and mind of its creator. As of the year of this cogitator's installation, merely a small fraction of the great Parsimus's designs has yet been made a reality, but already their audacity and grandeur are staggering. Footfall is to become the gateway to the savage and barely explored {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}, a foothold for future conquests by the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g} and the noble Parsimus Dewain, who acts by the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g}'s will..."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman İstasyonu, Parsimus Dewain tarafından yıldızların içindeki saray olacak şekilde hayal edildi. Ruhen de zihnen de yaratıcısı kadar görkemli olacaktı. Bu kavramsayarın kurulduğu yıl itibarıyla ulu Parsimus'un tasarımının yalnızca küçük bir kısmı gerçeğe dönüştürülebildi ancak onun bile yürekliliği ve görkemi göz kamaştıran cinstendir. Binliman, yaban ve neredeyse hiç keşfedilmemiş {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ne bir kapı, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'un ve {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'un iradesince hareket eden Parsimus Dewain'in gelecekteki fetihleri için de bir dayanak görevi görecek."
